github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Allowed types: feat, fix, chore, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, ci, build

Monorepo scopes: app (Flutter mobile app in apps/mobile/), web-app (Angular app in apps/web-app/), landing (Next.js page in apps/landing/), functions (Cloud Functions in apps/functions/), firebase (rules, indexes in firebase/), deps (dependency updates), ci (CI/CD workflows in .github/). Omit scope for root-level or cross-cutting changes.
Write the description in lowercase, no period at the end. Keep the subject line under 72 characters.
For breaking changes, add '!' after scope: feat(app)!: remove legacy auth flow
Use the body for additional context when needed, separated by a blank line. Reference GitHub issues with #<number> in the footer when applicable.
If changes span multiple scopes, omit the scope or use the primary one.
